gen:link.msg:message: `OperatingExpenses` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_OperatingExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_OperatingExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
